Html:
hello, I've come across a project which needs to deal with a scenario in which
the chunks of audio ( MP3) are received over a period of time(like every 2 secs) in "byte arrays" .
I've searched the discussions for a combined case of stream and playing from byte[] and couldn't find any.
could someone please redirect / help me?

p.s: i'm pretty new to working with Naudio and playing mp3 with it in C# ,so introducing demos and examples would be a great help and highly appreciated
the NAudio demo source code includes an example of receiving streamed MP3 and playing it back.
hi thanks fro reply, that's true, but it's playing from a url ,and what I need is to play them from byte arrays with delay over time.any help is appreciated.
It would be exactly the same. NetworkStream reads byte arrays over the network.
